A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As an avid long-time Star Wars fan\, I was incredibly disappointed with The Last Jedi.  So many under developed characters and plot lines with great potential that were ended too soon. Clearly written by a movie writer rather than a series/franchise maker. Tone and timing issues with the humor. Was not Episode V level witty humor\, but rather silly humor meant for kids that cheapened the overall vibe.  This was the first episode that to me felt like a Star Wars-themed Disney movie rather than a true Star Wars installment. And enough of the veganism and anti-war message sideshow - there's a place for that and it's not a Star Wars storyline. The Lucas-Star Wars is now truly gone. Worst Star Wars movie ever made!!
